description.plain: Hunter Hayes is an American country music singer, songwriter, and multi-instrumentalist. He is signed to Warner Music Nashville.

body.plain: Hunter Hayes is an American country music singer, songwriter, and multi-instrumentalist. He is signed to Warner Music Nashville.

songs.title: Wanted

description.plain:
Co-written by Hunter Hayes and Troy Verges, Hayes released “Wanted” in March 2012 as the second single from his debut studio album, Hunter Hayes.

The song’s title capitalizes on a classic country western meme, the “Wanted” poster:

songs.embed_content: Read “Wanted” by Hunter Hayes on Genius

body.plain:
Co-written by Hunter Hayes and Troy Verges, Hayes released “Wanted” in March 2012 as the second single from his debut studio album, Hunter Hayes.

The song’s title capitalizes on a classic country western meme, the “Wanted” poster:

songs.lyrics:
25 ContributorsWanted Lyrics[Verse 1]
You know I'd fall apart without you
I don't know how you do what you do
'Cause everything that don't make sense about me
Makes sense when I'm with you

[Verse 2]
Like everything that's green, girl
I need you
But it's more than one and one makes two
Put aside the math and the logic of it
You gotta know you're wanted too
[Chorus]
'Cause I wanna wrap you up
Wanna kiss your lips
I wanna make you feel wanted
And I wanna call you mine
Wanna hold your hand forever
And never let you forget it
Yeah, I, I wanna make you feel wanted

[Verse 3]
Well, anyone can tell you you're pretty
And you get that all the time, I know you do
But your beauty's deeper than the makeup
And I wanna show you what I see tonight

[Chorus]
When I wrap you up
When I kiss your lips
I, I wanna make you feel wanted
And I wanna call you mine
Wanna hold your hand forever
And never let you forget it
'Cause baby, I, I wanna make you feel wanted

[Bridge]
As good as you make me feel (Make me feel)
I wanna make you feel better
Better than your fairy tales (Than your fairy tales)
Better than your best dreams (Your best dreams)
You're more than everything I need
You're all I ever wanted
All I ever wanted
You might also like[Chorus]
And I just wanna wrap you up
Wanna kiss your lips
I, I wanna make you feel wanted
And I wanna call you mine
Wanna hold your hand forever
And never let you forget it
Yeah, I, I wanna make you feel wanted
Baby, I, I wanna make you feel
Wanted

[Outro]
'Cause you'll always be wanted40Embed

songs.title: Dear God

description.plain: So often, when writing something really personal, there’s a long conversation before you even start writing the actual song that I always forget the details about or the origin. One of the things I love so much about this song is that the conversation before we started writing this was all captured in Andy’s “The Good Parts” podcast (which I’m a huge fan of). He has excellent conversations with people about their faith and beliefs and it’s honestly what opened the door for us to talk about the idea that I had for the song as just a desperate prayer where all I wanted was to be reassured that everything is meant for good. I believe It’s ok to question so many of these things because in our search we find or are given the answers or shown the reasons and we grow from our experiences and are hopefully made stronger through the search.

songs.embed_content: Read “Dear God” by Hunter Hayes on Genius

body.plain: So often, when writing something really personal, there’s a long conversation before you even start writing the actual song that I always forget the details about or the origin. One of the things I love so much about this song is that the conversation before we started writing this was all captured in Andy’s “The Good Parts” podcast (which I’m a huge fan of). He has excellent conversations with people about their faith and beliefs and it’s honestly what opened the door for us to talk about the idea that I had for the song as just a desperate prayer where all I wanted was to be reassured that everything is meant for good. I believe It’s ok to question so many of these things because in our search we find or are given the answers or shown the reasons and we grow from our experiences and are hopefully made stronger through the search.

songs.full_title: Dear God by Chad Graham (Ft. Fallon Graham)
songs.title: Dear God

songs.lyrics:
29 ContributorsDear God Lyrics[Intro]
Oh na-na, oh na-na
Oh na-na, oh na-na

[Verse 1]
Here I go again
Three glasses in, countin' my sins
Home alone again
It's three in the mornin'
Just me and my demons at war again
So I'm callin' in, are you listenin'?
[Pre-Chorus]
You made a man that's fragile
You made a heart that can break
You showed me the road less traveled
Knowin' I'm gonna run away
You make me love so hard
When everything I love just leaves
Are you sure there's nothin' wrong with me?

[Chorus]
And why does my life have to hurt so much?
Why can't I find any peace or love?
And why do I feel like I'm not enough?
Dear God, are you sure that you don't mess up?

[Verse 2]
Can we still call it prayin' if
All that I do is sittin' here cursin', cursin' your name again?
But truth is it's not even you
It's just me that I'm up against
But you made me this
Can we share the blame for this? Mmm

[Pre-Chorus]
'Cause after all, you made a man that's fragile
You made a heart that can break
I know you showed me the road less traveled
Knowin' I'm gonna run away
You make me love so hard
When everything I love just leaves
Are you sure that there's nothin' wrong with me?
You might also like[Chorus]
'Cause why does my life have to hurt so much?
Why can't I find any peace or love?
And why do I feel like I'm not enough?
Dear God, are you sure that you don't, that you don't mess up?

[Post-Chorus]
You don't mess up
I know you don't mess up
I know that you don't mess up

[Bridge]
I know this ain't for nothin'
There's nothin' you don't make
I know you got your reasons
This shit's just hard to take
I don't mean to criticize you
I know I'm hard to teach
I know you tell me there's nothin' wrong with me

[Chorus]
Yeah, but why does my life have to hurt so much?
And why can't I find any peace or love?
And why do I feel like I'm not enough?
Dear God, are you sure that you don't, that you don't mess up?
[Post-Chorus]
You don't mess up
No, you don't mess up, yeah
Dear God, just remind me you don't mess up2Embed

songs.full_title: I Want Crazy by Hunter Hayes
songs.title: I Want Crazy

description.plain:
Hunter Hayes', “I Want Crazy” single topped the charts at #1 following its release in 2011. In the music video, the song expresses the complications and craziness about being in a long distance relationship.

In an interview with Radio.com, Hayes says:

When you have to make adjustments to your lifestyle to figure out how to tone it down or how to incorporate all this stuff, that means you really care about this person and you want to be with them. That’s a really natural thing. I love that you have to make an adjustment at that point. That’s how real it is."

songs.embed_content: Read “I Want Crazy” by Hunter Hayes on Genius

body.plain:
Hunter Hayes', “I Want Crazy” single topped the charts at #1 following its release in 2011. In the music video, the song expresses the complications and craziness about being in a long distance relationship.

In an interview with Radio.com, Hayes says:

When you have to make adjustments to your lifestyle to figure out how to tone it down or how to incorporate all this stuff, that means you really care about this person and you want to be with them. That’s a really natural thing. I love that you have to make an adjustment at that point. That’s how real it is."

songs.lyrics:
12 ContributorsI Want Crazy Lyrics[Verse 1]
I'm booking myself a one-way flight
I gotta see the color in your eyes
And telling myself I'm gonna be alright
Without you, baby, is a waste of time
Yeah, our first date, girl, the seasons changed
It got washed away in a summer rain
You can't undo a fall like this
'Cause love don't know what distance is
Yeah, I know it's crazy
[Chorus]
But I don't want "good" and I don't want "good enough"
I want "can't sleep, can't breathe without your love"
Front porch and one more kiss
It doesn't make sense to anybody else
Who cares if you're all I think about?
I've searched the world and I know now
It ain't right if you ain't lost your mind
Yeah, I don't want easy, I want crazy
Are you with me, baby? Let's be crazy
Yeah

[Verse 2]
Well, I wanna be scared, don't wanna know why
Wanna feel good, don't have to be right
The world makes all kinds of rules for love
I say you gotta let it do what it does
I don't want just another hug and a kiss goodnight
Catching up calls and a date sometimes
I love that we're rebels and we still believe
We're the kind of crazy people wish that they could be, yeah
Uh, and I know we're crazy, yeah

[Chorus]
But I don't want "good" and I don't want "good enough"
I want "can't sleep, can't breathe without your love"
Front porch and one more kiss
It doesn't make sense to anybody else
Who cares if you're all I think about?
I've searched the world and I know now
It ain't right if you ain't lost your mind
Yeah, I don't want easy, I want crazy
Are you with me, baby? Let's be crazy
You might also like[Interlude]
Na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na

[Chorus]
No, I don't want "good" and I don't want "good enough"
I want "can't sleep, can't breathe without your love"
Front porch and one more kiss
It doesn't make sense to anybody else
Who cares if you're all I think about?
I've searched the world and I know now
It ain't right if you ain't lost your mind
Yeah, I don't want easy, I want crazy

[Bridge]
Yeah, look at us, baby
Tonight the midnight rules are breaking
There's no such thing as wild enough
Maybe we just think too much
Who needs to play it safe in love?
Let's be crazy

[Outro]
Who cares if we're crazy
We gotta be crazy
I know that we're crazy
So let's be crazy
Yeah, yeah20Embed
